about_the_game:
At our indie studio, we're passionate about creating the best pirate gaming experience. That's why we're working on new projects and games that will immerse you in the high seas and the world of piracy.

If you've enjoyed playing ‘Corsairs Legacy’ and want to see more games about pirates from us in the future, we would be incredibly grateful for your support. By purchasing the ‘Corsairs Legacy’ Supporter Pack, you'll be directly contributing to the development of our future projects and helping us achieve our global plans.

And as a thank you for your support, we'll also provide you with exclusive digital souvenirs that are unique to the Supporter Pack:

- Unique sword and the appearance of the protagonist;
- Stylized wallpapers;
- Digital art book.

See you in the game! ‘Corsairs Legacy' awaits!
